name: Sir.
description:
Walk around a strange classroom and piece together what happened to  a missing high school teacher - Sir. Use clues scattered around to learn the story and Get Out.


Theme

The game is about you, a living (Above) student solving the case of a dead (Below) highschool teacher.

As time passes, the school bell will ring. Enemies, who are mirror images of yourself, will mimic your past actions (As Above). They will patrol where you have been (So Below) and chase you down.

Controls

Right Click to Rotate the Camera around the classroom.

Left Click to Move

E to Interact with objects / clues

Hints - If you are struggling these will help : )

1 - You will need a 6 digit code to unlock the door that appears everytime the bell rings, this code is made up of 3 2 digit numbers that represent Who, What, and Why.

2 - Who -  Use the register and the classroom layout to find whose desk contains the motive. The desk number 01, 02, 03 etc. is the code needed.

3 - What - The weapon used to kill the teacher will have a 2 digit number on it.

4 - What - People tend to use birthdays as passwords.

5 - Why - The 2 digit number will present itself on the motive.
